WELCOME_MESSAGE: Hi, it's me! Mario! Send me a message and I will generate some images for you.
NO_CONNECTION_MESSAGE: Sorry bro, I can't stabilize a connection. Please try again later.
ERROR_MESSAGE: Man, I can't connect anymore, try again later.
EDIT_API_URL_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You changed API URLs, and it looks like it's working
EDIT_API_URL_ERROR_MESSAGE: You changed API URLs, but I think you did it wrong
EDIT_LANGUAGE_MESSAGE: You changed my language! Nice bro!
